lead_paragraph: They may need a rally to restore sanity at Redskins Park before this story is over: Mike Wise of The Washington Post on a quarterback drama that has just begun:
snippet: Redskins Coach Mike Shanahan's decision to bench Donovan McNabb in favor of Rex Grossman is sure to raise questions in Washington.

headline.main: Grossman Over McNabb: Did Shanahan Make Right Call?

abstract: Redskins Coach Mike Shanahan's decision to bench Donovan McNabb in favor of Rex Grossman is sure to raise questions in Washington.
